items.name: 25% off Coupon
items.desc: Get 25% off the purchase of a shop.

items.name: 50% off Coupon
items.desc: Get 50% off the purchase of an shop.

items.name: Two Extra Dice
items.desc: Get 1 extra dice for the roll this turn.

items.name: Double Turn
items.desc: Roll again after landing on a tile.

items.name: Invisible
items.desc: Skip the on tile effects for this roll.

items.name: Steal Set Piece
items.desc: Steal a set piece of your choice from another player.

items.name: Thief
items.desc: Steal 100 * your level in gold from another player.

items.name: Double Stock
items.desc: You can buy double the stock this turn.

items.name: Steal Item
items.desc: Steal a random item from a random player.

items.name: Commision
items.desc: Take 20% of all sales profit until the user's next turn.

items.name: Big Commision
items.desc: Take 40% of all sales profit until the user's next turn.

items.name: Stock Stealer
items.desc: Take 50% of all stock profit until the user's next turn.

items.name: Bingo Player
items.desc: Select a number on the bingo sheet to stamp.
